metadata.title: CVE-2020-10720 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel's implementation of GRO in versionsbefore 5.2. This flaw allows an attacker with local access to crash thesystem.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
